name: Where's My Charger!?
description:
Where’s My Charger or WMC for short is an Endless Runner Mobile Game. This game was designed as a time killer and just to have fun anytime or anywhere.

The story or concept behind this game was that was that there was a gamer just like us gaming on his laptop. But what he didn’t know was that his charger was not connected and as he gets that “15% battery left” pop-up he screams “Where’s My Charger!?” and then we designed a game with a battery and a charger where the objective is to fill up the battery and keep the gamer happy!
